mapper.sql: SELECT ta.* FROM sys_dictionary_data ta LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary tb ON ta.dict_id = tb.dict_id AND tb.deleted = 0 WHERE ta.deleted = 0 AND tb.dict_code = 'sex'
SELECT a.user_id, GROUP_CONCAT(b.role_name) role_name FROM sys_user_role a LEFT JOIN sys_role b ON a.role_id = b.role_id GROUP BY a.user_id
